Song.title: The Final Word Is Christ
Song.copyright: © 2013 Sovereign Grace Praise Words & Music by Doug Plank & Jonathan Jackson

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [6/4 | C 4/4 | F/C | 6/4 | C 4/4 | F/C | |]
Verse 1: Why [C]should my doubts and questions r[F]ise{,} with [Am]every passing s[G]torm? Why [C]does my heart believe the [F]lies{,} that [Am]God would do me h[G]arm? To this [F]madness and my [G]unbelief, my G[Am]od, you have repl[D]ied: "I've not [F]spared my only [C]Son from grief, for [F]you, for y[G]ou He [(turn)]died!”
Turn: [6/4 | Am G C/E 4/4 | F | 6/4 | Am G C/E 4/4 | F | |]
Verse 2: How [C]deep, how full, how sweet the [F]word{,} that [Am]good shall come to p[G]ass That [C]every sorrow, sovereign [F]Lord, shall [Am]be transformed at [G]last My [F]mind cannot per[G]ceive the end{,} nor [Am]make sense of the m[D]eans But on [F]Christ the Lord my [C]soul depends{,} and [F]on His pr[G]omise [(turn)]leans
Verse 3: Take [C]care, my soul, let praises r[F]ise{,} when [Am]God wills strife or p[G]eace For[C]bid the unbelieving [F]lies{,} that [Am]overlook His [G]grace Oh, [F]sing again of [G]Jesus Christ, His [Am]cruel and bitter [D]cross Come, [F]give your all, pour [C]out your life, count [F]every[G]thing as [(instrumental)]loss
Instr: [6/4 ||: F C/E G 4/4 | Am | :|| 6/4 Am G C/E 4/4 | F | |]
Verse 4: Now, [C]what shall come between us, L[F]ord{,} and [Am]who can cut the [G]ties That [C]You have made by shedding b[F]lood{,} with [Am]agonies and [G]cries? Shall [F]humans, devils, [G]powers here{,} come [Am]take my source, my [D]life? Have [F]peace, my soul, cast [C]off your fears{,} the [F]final w[G]ord is [(outro)]Christ
Outro: [||: C | | F | :|| 6/4 Am G C/E 4/4 | F]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 why should my doubts and questions rise with every passing storm why does my heart believe the lies that god would do me harm to this madness and my unbelief my god you have replied ive not spared my only son from grief for you for you he died turn verse 2 how deep how full how sweet the word that good shall come to pass that every sorrow sovereign lord shall be transformed at last my mind cannot perceive the end nor make sense of the means but on christ the lord my soul depends and on his promise leans verse 3 take care my soul let praises rise when god wills strife or peace forbid the unbelieving lies that overlook his grace oh sing again of jesus christ his cruel and bitter cross come give your all pour out your life count everything as loss instr verse 4 now what shall come between us lord and who can cut the ties that you have made by shedding blood with agonies and cries shall humans devils powers here come take my source my life have peace my soul cast off your fears the final word is christ outro
